name: Metronidazole
warningsAndPrecautions: metronidazole tablets , usp available follows : 500 mg - white , oblong , convex tablets debossed “ pliva 334 ” one side unscored side . available ndc : 70518-1240-00 ndc : 70518-1240-01 packaging : 4 1 bottle plastic packaging : 14 1 bottle plastic storage stability store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect light dispense tight , light-resistant container defined usp , child-resistant closure ( required ) . keep medications reach children . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Metronidazole tablets, USP are available as follows:
                  500 mg - White, oblong, convex tablets debossed “PLIVA 334” on one side and unscored on the other side. Available in
                  NDC: 70518-1240-00
                  NDC: 70518-1240-01
                  PACKAGING: 4 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 14 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  
                  Storage and Stability
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  PROTECT FROM LIGHT
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP, with a child-resistant closure (as required).
                  Keep this and all medications out of the reach of children.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
